## PluginConfig.baseRef property

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Git ref to use as the baseline for comparison. If not provided, will use the latest release tag or 'main'.

**Signature:**

```typescript
baseRef?: string;
```
